_comment_general: This file configures the 'Updates Widget' on your dashboard. You can change the widgetType and widgetConfig to display different kinds of content.
_comment_widgetType: Defines the type of widget to display. Supported types: 'announcement', 'spotifyEmbed', 'htmlContent', 'image'.
_comment_widgetConfig: Configuration specific to the chosen widgetType. The active configuration uses plain keys (e.g., 'html'). Examples for other types use an '_example' suffix (e.g., 'title_announcement_example').
